ImmutableDate

public ImmutableDate(int year,
                     int month,
                     int day)
Parameters:
year - the four digit year 1988 = 1988, not the java.sql.Date format of 88.
month - 1 jan to 12 December
day - TODO this returns Standard Time for example Eastern Standard Time not Daylight times if Daylight savings is in effect
